org.jclouds.trmk.ecloud

Interface TerremarkECloudAsyncApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, TerremarkECloudAsyncClient, TerremarkVCloudAsyncClient
    Deprecated. 
    The async interface will be removed in jclouds 1.7.

    @Deprecated
public interface TerremarkECloudAsyncApi
extends TerremarkECloudAsyncClient
    Provides access to eCloud resources via their REST API.

    Author:
    Adrian Cole
    See Also:
